title: Use big tobacco's Nov 26 corrective statements to reduce smoking

title_detail.value: Use big tobacco's Nov 26 corrective statements to reduce smoking

summary: The court-ordered publication of 'corrective statements' by major US tobacco companies later this month should serve as a reminder that tobacco addiction remains a major health problem in the country and that Big Tobacco has a long history of marketing practices aimed at hooking a new generation on a lethal product, according to a new article.
